message.en: The only reason we're ok with it is cause we're constructs.{p=0.5} The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is actually real!
message.es: The only reason we're ok with it is cause we're constructs.{p=0.5} The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is actually real!

message.en: Such struggle...{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]they[/color] ought to feel validated for that alone.
